H0.text: what type of government does russia have 2010. Monarchy

H1.text: what type of government does russia have 2010. Democracy

H2.text: what type of government does russia have 2010. Authoritarian Regime

H3.text: what type of government does russia have 2010. Republic

A4.text: since the turn of the century, the political system of Russia has been dominated by Vladimir Putin, under whose leadership the country has experienced democratic backsliding and has been transformed into an authoritarian regime

A5.text: Russia, by constitution, is a symmetric federal republic with a semi-presidential system

A6.text: The President may decide at any time to dismiss the Government.

A7.text: After each election of the President of the Russian Federation, the Government resigns its powers.
